scripts.copy-files: shx cp main/typescript/package.json build/dist/package.json && shx cp main/typescript/Main/*.css build/dist/Main && shx cp main/typescript/Main/*.svg build/dist/Main && shx cp main/typescript/Hello/*.css build/dist/Hello
scripts.build: yarn upgrade --pattern strata && tsc && cd main/typescript && yarn run increment-snapshot && cd ../.. && yarn run copy-files && cd build/dist && yarn pack
scripts.publish-package: yarn run build && cd build/dist && yarn publish --non-interactive
